| HistoryText             = This team of Skrulls were brainwashed to believe that they were Superheroes. After a short battle, the T-Rex broke it up and the team was not seen again until they meet the real Avengers afterwards. After fighting with both the [[Mighty Avengers (Initiative) (Earth-616)|Mighty Avengers]] and [[New Avengers (Earth-616)|New Avengers]] as well as the residents of the Savage Land, they were eventually all killed.{{r|Secret Invasion Vol 1 1|2}}{{r|Secret Invasion Vol 1 5}}{{r|Mighty Avengers Vol 1 14}}{{r|New Avengers Vol 1 43}}
